Title: Book of Ruth
Writer: Whit Anderson, Bill Dubuque (created by), Mark Williams (created by), Martin Zimmerman, Paul Kolsby (staff writer)
Actors: Jason Bateman, Laura Linney, Sofia Hublitz, Skylar Gaertner
Plot: Jacob educates Marty on his business. Ruth devises and sets in motion a deadly plan. Rachel learns Marty is cooking the books at the Blue Cat Lodge.
